content: Hi folks, please start putting your thoughts in order for the event. Please make sure you're ready to go for when the event commences. If you need a development environment, ensure it's installed and ready to go. Make sure you and everyone you know are attending are on the zulip chat. Check out the FHIR specifications; including the brand new ResearchStudy and ResearchSubject resources referenced above!
We're going to need an R4 supporting EHR system for testing the new versions of these resources. Anyone with an idea about that would be great - can't see it as an option for the hspc sandbox

Hi Geoff, I'm working now to prepare our server to support the new ResearchStudy and ResearchSubject resources in R4 for the Connectathon. I will be attending the Clinical Research track in New Orleans as well. The examples in the current build appear to be placeholders. Are more detailed examples available for these two resources that I might be able to use to prepare?
@Sam Hume sent you an invite to the clinresearch sandbox
